channel.title: Stackable Error Bug! Help!
channel.description:
I got a really annoying bug, and no idea why it's happening. This pops up on my run.batch file when I log in on any character. Says something about error on items being stackable. I don't know what I did for this to happen, because I just recently noticed this. Please, any help is VERY appreciated!!
[code] LoboScape Server. Connection from localhost:1978 [client-1-Snow]: Loading Process Completed [Has powers, lag: 0 ms] ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (localhost) Connection from localhost:1979 [client-1-Snow]: Loading Process Completed [Has powers, lag: 0 ms] Critical error while loading stackabledata! Trace: java.io.FileNotFoundException: data\stackable.dat (The system cannot find the pa th specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:106) at Item.<clinit>(Item.java:346) at Player.appendPlayerAppearance(Player.java:1194) at Player.appendPlayerUpdateBlock(Player.java:1318) at PlayerHandler.updatePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:80) at client.initialize(client.java:9546) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:338) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) Critical error while loading notedata! Trace: java.io.FileNotFoundException: data\notes.dat (The system cannot find the path s pecified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:106) at Item.<clinit>(Item.java:374) at Player.appendPlayerAppearance(Player.java:1194) at Player.appendPlayerUpdateBlock(Player.java:1318) at PlayerHandler.updatePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:80) at client.initialize(client.java:9546) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:338) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) Critical error while loading twohanded! Trace: java.io.FileNotFoundException: data\twohanded.dat (The system cannot find the pa th specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:106) at Item.<clinit>(Item.java:391) at Player.appendPlayerAppearance(Player.java:1194) at Player.appendPlayerUpdateBlock(Player.java:1318) at PlayerHandler.updatePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:80) at client.initialize(client.java:9546) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:338) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) Critical error while loading tradeable! Trace: java.io.FileNotFoundException: data\tradeable.dat (The system cannot find the pa th specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:106) at Item.<clinit>(Item.java:409) at Player.appendPlayerAppearance(Player.java:1194) at Player.appendPlayerUpdateBlock(Player.java:1318) at PlayerHandler.updatePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:80) at client.initialize(client.java:9546) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:338) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) Critical error while loading sellable! Trace: java.io.FileNotFoundException: data\sellable.dat (The system cannot find the pat h specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:106) at Item.<clinit>(Item.java:427) at Player.appendPlayerAppearance(Player.java:1194) at Player.appendPlayerUpdateBlock(Player.java:1318) at PlayerHandler.updatePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:80) at client.initialize(client.java:9546) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:338) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) [/code]

item.title: Stackable Error Bug! Help!
item.dc:creator: @Rockin Rockin
item.description:
@Rockin wrote:

I got a really annoying bug, and no idea why it’s happening. This pops up on my run.batch file when I log in on any character. Says something about error on items being stackable. I don’t know what I did for this to happen, because I just recently noticed this. Please, any help is VERY appreciated!!
